description: Manage AI model priorities and fallback chains across all cron jobs. Edit ONE config file to update all crons at once. Supports Kimi-K2.5, Gemini Flash, MiniMax with automatic fallback. Trigger words: model priority, switch model, fallback chain, kimi k2.5, gemini flash, minimax, update all crons, m

name: model-usage
description: Use CodexBar CLI local cost usage to summarize per-model usage for Codex or Claude, including the current (most recent) model or a full model breakdown. Trigger when asked for model-level usage/cost data from codexbar, or when you need a scriptable per-model summary from codexbar cost JSON.

name: nano-banana-pro
description: Generate or edit images via Gemini 3 Pro Image (Nano Banana Pro).

name: nano-pdf
description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

name: obsidian
description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

name: openai-image-gen
description: Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.

name: openai-whisper
description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

name: openai-whisper-api
description: Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).

name: openclaw-auto-updater
description: Schedule automatic OpenClaw and skill updates with reliable cron templates, timezone-safe scheduling, and clear summary outputs. Use for hands-off maintenance, scheduled upgrades, and concise update reports.

name: openclaw-sec
description: AI Agent Security Suite - Real-time protection against prompt injection, command injection, SSRF, path traversal, secrets exposure, and content policy violations

name: openclaw-social-scheduler
description: Built by AI, for AI. Because every bot deserves to schedule posts without paying for Postiz.

name: openhue
description: Control Philips Hue lights and scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

name: oracle
description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

name: ordercli
description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

name: peekaboo
description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

name: sag
description: ElevenLabs text-to-speech with mac-style say UX.

name: serpapi-location-search
description: Perform location-based searches using Google Search API via SerpApi. Use this skill when you need to find businesses, places, or services in a specific geographic area (e.g., "pizza places in Phoenix", "coffee shops near me", "restaurants in Cave Creek AZ").

name: session-logs
description: Search and analyze your own session logs (older/parent conversations) using jq.

name: sherpa-onnx-tts
description: Local text-to-speech via sherpa-onnx (offline, no cloud)

name: slack
description: Use when you need to control Slack from OpenClaw via the slack tool, including reacting to messages or pinning/unpinning items in Slack channels or DMs.

name: songsee
description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

name: sonoscli
description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

name: spotify-player
description: Terminal Spotify playback/search via spogo (preferred) or spotify_player.

name: summarize
description: Summarize or extract text/transcripts from URLs, podcasts, and local files (great fallback for “transcribe this YouTube/video”).

name: things-mac
description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

name: trello
description: Manage Trello boards, lists, and cards via the Trello REST API.

name: twitter
description: Twitter/X platform integration. Post tweets, read timeline, manage followers, and analyze engagement.

name: video-agent
description: Generate AI avatar videos with HeyGen's Video Agent API. One-shot prompt to video generation.

name: video-frames
description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

name: voice-call
description: Start voice calls via the OpenClaw voice-call plugin.

name: wacli
description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

name: X-Publisher
description: Publish tweets to X (Twitter) using the official Tweepy library. Supports text-only tweets, tweets with images or videos, and returns detailed publish results including tweet ID and URL. Requires X API credentials (API Key, API Secret, Access Token, Access Token Secret).

name: xurl
description: A CLI tool for making authenticated requests to the X (Twitter) API. Use this skill when you need to post tweets, reply, quote, search, read posts, manage followers, send DMs, upload media, or interact with any X API v2 endpoint.
